Interface ClientCardState

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientAwaitConfirmCardStateDecorator, ClientBaseCardState, ClientCargoPenaltyCardStateDecorator, ClientCargoRewardCardStateDecorator, ClientCombatZoneIndexCardStateDecorator, ClientCreditsRewardCardStateDecorator, ClientCrewPenaltyCardStateDecorator, ClientEnemyCardStateDecorator, ClientLandingCardStateDecorator, ClientMeteoriteCardStateDecorator, ClientNewCenterCardStateDecorator, ClientProjectileCardStateDecorator
public interface ClientCardState extends Serializable
Interface representing a client side CardState, that can display its info.
